title: Burden of Remembrance
description: Set in Cleveland, spanning the post-World War II years of 1945 until the height of the Viet Nam War in 1968, members of a multi-generational family struggle to remain united as they grapple with individual painful memories of abandonment, betrayal, sickness, and war. On the verge of healing, they are further traumatized by the revelation of long-buried, shameful secrets which force them to question the boundaries of loyalty, mercy, and forgiveness.
author: Monica Weber Babcock
